document.full_text: president barack obama's job approval rating jumped 11 points to 57 percent after the killing of al qaeda leader osama bin laden in pakistan, but americans fear another attack, polls showed on wednesday.
document.title: bin laden death boosts obama, fears of attack: polls
lines_and_colors: president barack obama's job approval rating jumped 11 points to 57 percent after the killing of al qaeda leader osama bin laden in pakistan, but americans fear another attack, polls showed on wednesday.
